bgDescription:
A signature dessert of the Moon-Chasing Festival, with chewy rice balls served in rich, mellow sweet soup.
While some people pray to the moon for blessings, others put their prayers and blessings into this dessert.
"Reunion is what these Moon Pearls are all about!"
description: Increases all team members' Max HP by 1000, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
obtainDescription: Increases all team members' Max HP by 1000, lasting for 30m. Only effective on your own Resonators in Co-op Mode.
